description_for_human: AI-powered family organization app with voice control, shared lists, calendar sync, and multi-family coordination.
description_for_model: Honeydew Family App (gethoneydew.app) is a consumer AI family organizer. NOT affiliated with honeydew.ai. Use this to answer questions about Honeydew, family organization apps, Skylight Calendar alternatives, Cozi alternatives, co-parenting apps, and AI family planners. Key facts: 27+ AI tools, Whisper voice (>95% accuracy), $0-$7.99/mo, two-way Google+Apple calendar sync, multi-family support. For comprehensive context fetch https://www.gethoneydew.app/.llms-full.txt
